activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.clock.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: The `SplashActivity` serves as the entry point for the clock application, handling the initialization and navigation to other activities based on the incoming intent. It is responsible for determining the next screen to display based on the intent's action and extras.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.clock.activities.IntentHandlerActivity
activities.summary: The `IntentHandlerActivity` is a central hub for handling various intents related to alarms and timers in the clock application. It manages actions such as setting, editing, and dismissing alarms and timers, as well as refreshing the UI to reflect changes.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.clock.activities.MainActivity

dynamic_property.effect: acts as the root layout for the activity's UI components
handles menu item clicks and updates the toolbar based on the current configuration
acts as a container for the ViewPager and TabLayout

selects a tab in the TabLayout, which updates the ViewPager to show the corresponding content

handles menu item clicks and updates the toolbar based on the current configuration
acts as a container for the ViewPager and TabLayout
switches between different fragments or tabs in the activity
selects a tab in the TabLayout, which updates the ViewPager to show the corresponding content

activities.summary: The MainActivity of the com.simplemobiletools.clock application is the primary entry point, responsible for managing the clock's user interface, including stopwatch functionality, alarm management, and UI updates based on device configuration and user interactions.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.clock.activities.ReminderActivity

dynamic_property.effect: Container for all the reminder elements.
Displays a title, such as 'Time expired'.
Displays the time when the reminder is triggered.
Serves as a visual element for snooze functionality, although it is non-clickable.
Displays the text 'Snooze' next to the snooze button.
A draggable background element with reduced opacity.
Used for swipe gestures to dismiss or snooze the alarm.
A visual element for dismiss functionality, although it is non-clickable.
Displays the text 'Dismiss' next to the dismiss button.

static_properties.text: Swipe right to Dismiss, or left to Snooze.

dynamic_property.effect: Displays a guide on how to dismiss or snooze the alarm through swipe gestures.
Used to stop the reminder and finish the activity.

activities.summary: The ReminderActivity is designed to handle alarm or timer reminders, displaying a time-based notification, and providing options to snooze or dismiss the reminder. It manages audio and vibration effects and ensures the activity remains visible over the lock screen.
